name: Art Gallery
description: A showcase of fine artworks and sculptures; adventurers can admire masterpieces, meet wealthy patrons, or discover hidden messages in the art.
atmosphere: The gallery is filled with soft, carefully positioned lighting that highlights each piece of art. The air carries the subtle scent of canvas, paint, and the refined atmosphere of culture. Visitors speak in hushed tones as they admire the masterpieces, creating an atmosphere of quiet appreciation and sophistication.
